description:

Attached to that nice body was a cock that when soft appeared uncut, but Kyler says he was circumcised. I'll let you be the judge. Either way, that nice cock is heaven   cut or uncut. Also, check out Soldier's Ball 3 and pick up a copy to see him in some man-on-man action.
title: Kyler
